about_the_game:
Take your next battle out of the frying pan and into the fire. Deck yourself out in style with this Agni Prime themed armor set!

Includes:
Agni Prime Armor Helmet Visor
Agni Prime Armor Uniform
Agni Prime HUD Nameplate
Angi Prime Player Banner
Angi Prime "Get Me Out of Here!" Helmet Decal
Angi Prime Weapon Skin
